attr.title: platformEGG
attr.desc: This game is a small platformer where you play as a ninja frog, who needs to bring an egg to finish line. Avoiding a lot of traps without dying or breaking the egg.
attr.inst: To download and prepare the 'platformEGG' game, visit https://tricky-fat-cat.itch.io/platformegg, download the '.pck' file, rename it to 'game.pck', move it to the 'gamedata' folder in your game directory, and launch the game.
